pages.title: Magma Heart
pages.text: This $(thing)curio$() will allow a $(turtlemancer) to recover life and hunger whenever they kill something. The $(item)Magma Heart$() can be obtained performing the $(l)$(l:turtlemancy:rituals/evil_rituals#ritual_of_the_magma_heart)Ritual of Magma$().

pages.title: Ritual of Magma
pages.description: This ritual will grant you a $(l:turtlemancy:equipment/magma_heart)$(item)Magma Heart$().
